message-center-listing-help.title: Search
message-center-listing-help.message: Search messages spanning up to 18 months for Programs, Alerts, and Communications.

title: MESSAGE CENTER
unsaved-changes-confirmation: You have unsaved changes on this page. Do you want to leave this page and discard your changes or stay on this page?

notification.communication-not-found: Communication not found. Please return to the homepage.
notification.return-home: Please return to the homepage and select a communication
notification.internal-user-message: Message center is currently not available for internal users

table.no-results-alert: You have no new alert communications
table.no-results-program: You have no new program communications
table.no-results-favorite: You have not marked any message as favorite. To mark message as favorite, click the star icon next to the date.
table.no-results-search: No Results. Your search did not return any matches. Please modify your search terms and try again.

follow-up.title: Follow Up
follow-up.no-data: There are no follow-up items at this time. Use "Refresh" link to get the latest.

polaris-connect.title: Polaris Connect
polaris-connect.description: Stay up-to-date on the latest news from Polaris vehicles including product introductions, new retail programs and other business updates.

dialog.title: Polaris Live Agent
dialog.description: This question is for Dealer Website Questions ONLY. Submit your questions below and a Polaris representative will reach out by phone as soon as possible.
dialog.disclaimer: Please verify your phone number before submitting the question.
dialog.success-message:
Thanks for your submission!

A Polaris representative will contact you shortly on the phone number provided.
dialog.off-hours-message:
Thank you for your submission.

Support is currently unavailable. Polaris Live Agent is available during the following hours:

  • Monday-Friday: 8:00 AM - 7:00 PM CST
  • Saturday: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM CST

However, your request is in process and we'll follow up as soon as possible during normal business hours.

We appreciate your patience.
dialog.failure-message: We're sorry, but there was an error submitting your request. Please try again later or call Dealer Support at {{supportPhoneNumber}}.

edit-widgets.title: Customize Homepage Apps
edit-widgets.description:
Personalize your homepage apps by dragging and dropping them within the list view. The default app is
pinned and cannot be removed, but it can be repositioned within the Homepage App list view.
edit-widgets.empty-available-widgets: All available apps have been added.
